column1: Group discussion on which are tools, supportive elements, and outcomes - some confusion/discussion on where the above stickies fall into each of these.
Main point: Improve tools for fisheries management including ecological forecasts, climate informed assessments and targets, long term projections
Maybe: Reform system to be more responsive to monitoring information (adaptive)
Reform system to be more resilient to pre-empted impacts (risk based evidence)
Adjust management targets/objectives for management (e.g. reduce yields, reduce acceptable risk, increase precautionary buffers)
Assessment models that explores a scaled Fenv.
Plan for changes of fishing opportunities
Increase fishing industry awareness of need for adaption
Increase decision-makers awareness of need for adaption
Increase scientists awareness of need for adaption
